title: Update 5.10 ?
body:
Does anyone know exactly what will be in there? Yorick update - -

EDIT: They buffed/nerfed random shit i dont care for. damn

replies.body: A good way to keep up to date is to follow surrender at 20! Gives you all the info you need~

> [{quoted}](name=ThatzSoDraven,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LMHt2WpT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-27T10:40:32.870+0000)
>
> A good way to keep up to date is to follow surrender at 20! Gives you all the info you need~

Ah thx, was hoping for a good update but its not too great. ;0
Np c: aha yeah, I feel the same xD

> [{quoted}](name=ThatzSoDraven,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LMHt2WpT,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T03:08:31.801+0000)
>
> Np c: aha yeah, I feel the same xD

lol

The main things for this patch are:

Ekko being added
Karma changes
Utility Mastery changes

And a cool looking Tryndamere skin.

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--AUIz6lS_Is/VV0HzUcMZ7I/AAAAAAAAqU0/sIaw_DY38ic/s1600/Tryndamere_Splash_7.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LMHt2WpT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-27T07:00:10.218+0000)
>
> The main things for this patch are:
> 
> Ekko being added
> Karma changes
> Utility Mastery changes
> 
> And a cool looking Tryndamere skin.
> 
> http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--AUIz6lS_Is/VV0HzUcMZ7I/AAAAAAAAqU0/sIaw_DY38ic/s1600/Tryndamere_Splash_7.jpg

What a shit update, for me (Ekko seems annoying, i dont like tryndamere and karma is still probably weak)
Ekko is love. Ekko is life.
